## R Markdown
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
snore = read.table("snore.txt")
```
```{r}
snore = data.frame(snore)
summary(snore)
print(snore[0])
```
```{r}
myplot = ggplot(snore, aes(x = height, y = weight))
myplot
```


```{r}
myplot = myplot + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```

```{r}
plot(myplot)
```
```{r}
myplot + xlim(c(160,200)) + ylim(c(40,120))
```
